questions.question: What are the central problems of an economy?

answers.a: How to produce, what to produce, and for whom to produce
answers.b: How to consume, what to consume, and when to consume
answers.c: How to save, what to save, and when to saved
answers.d: How to invest, what to invest, and when to invest

questions.question: Distinguish between explicit and implicit cost.

answers.a: Explicit cost is the cost of production, and implicit cost is the cost of materials
answers.b: Explicit cost is the cost of materials, and implicit cost is the cost of production
answers.c: Explicit cost is the cost of production, and implicit cost is the opportunity cost
answers.d: Explicit cost is the opportunity cost, and implicit cost is the cost of production

questions.question: Explain the conditions for profit maximization of a firm.

answers.a: MC = MR and MC is increasing
answers.b: MC = MR and MC is decreasing
answers.c: MC = MR and MC is constant
answers.d: MC = MR and MC is undefined

questions.question: Illustrate why the demand curve in perfect competition is perfectly elastic.

answers.a: Because the firm is a price taker
answers.b: Because the firm is a price maker
answers.c: Because the firm has a downward sloping demand curve
answers.d: Because the firm has an upward sloping demand curve

questions.question: Describe the fiscal policy measures to control an inflationary situation.

answers.a: Increase government spending and cut taxes
answers.b: Decrease government spending and increase taxes
answers.c: Increase government spending and increase taxes
answers.d: Decrease government spending and cut taxes

questions.question: Examine the advantages of protectionism in international trade.

answers.a: Increased competition, lower prices, and higher quality
answers.b: Reduced competition, higher prices, and lower quality
answers.c: Increased employment, higher wages, and improved trade balance
answers.d: Reduced employment, lower wages, and worsened trade balance

answers.b: Devaluation is an increase in the value of a currency, and depreciation is a decrease
answers.c: Devaluation is a decrease in the value of a currency due to government action, and depreciation is a decrease due to market forces
answers.d: Devaluation is an increase in the value of a currency due to government action, and depreciation is an increase due to market forces

questions.question: Explain the concept of opportunity cost and its linkage with PPC.

answers.a: Opportunity cost is the cost of choosing one option over another, and PPC shows the trade-offs between different options
answers.b: Opportunity cost is the benefit of choosing one option over another, and PPC shows the benefits of different options
answers.c: Opportunity cost is the cost of producing one good, and PPC shows the production possibilities of different goods
answers.d: Opportunity cost is the benefit of producing one good, and PPC shows the benefits of producing different goods
